content: Wow, things have truly changed on our planet. I taught myself to play in 1982, when I was twelve. I played until my fingers literally bled, but I was determined to be a Rock Star. I guess the only advice I can offer beginners is this: You do not have to press the strings extremely hard to the fretboard in order to produce sound, but this will become evident the longer you play. Whatever the case though, do not quit. Remember, Rome wasn’t built in a day
